description._content: Photographer: Unknown, Non-Indian Subject: Museum of the American Indian - Heye Foundation (MAI), 1916-1989        George Hubbard Pepper, Non-Indian, 1873-1924        Mrs. George H. Pepper (Jay), Non-Indian        Thea Heye (Mrs. Thea Page), Non-Indian, 1888-1935        George Gustav Heye (GGH), Non-Indian, 1874-1957        Harmon W. Hendricks (Harmon Washington Hendricks), Non-Indian, 1846-1928        Archer M. Huntington (Archer Milton Huntington), Non-Indian, 1870-1955        Frederick K. Seward (Frederick Kimber Seward), Non-Indian, 1878-1943        James Bishop Ford, Non-Indian, 1844-1928        William C. Orchard, Non-Indian, ca. 1861-ca. 1945        Dr. Marshall H. Saville (Marshall Howard Saville/M.H. Saville), Non-Indian, 1867-1935        Mrs. James B. Clemens (Marie Heye Clemens), Non-Indian, ca. 1869-1943        Fred Mifsud (Frederick Francis Mifsud), Non-Indian, 1899-1985 Date Created: November 8, 1916 Catalog Number: P11449 Format: Albumen print Dimensions: 10 x 12.5 in. Collection History: Presumably commissioned by George Heye to document the early work of the Museum of the American Indian. Description: George Gustav Heye laying the corner stone of Museum of the American Indian, Heye Foundation. From L: Mrs George H. Pepper, George H. Pepper, Dr. Marshall H. Saville, Mrs. James B. Clemens, Mrs. Thea Heye, George Gustav Heye, Harmon W. Hendricks, Archer M. Huntington, Frederick K. Seward, James B. Ford, William C. Orchard, Fred Mifsud Place: Museum of the American Indian/Heye Foundation, 155th Street and Broadway; New York City, Manhattan; New York County; New York; USA Site Name: Museum of the American Indian/Heye Foundation, 155th Street and Broadway Island Name: Manhattan Island Culture/People: Non-Indian See more items in: Photographic Collections Persistent URL:http://www.americanindian.si.edu/searchcollections/item.aspx?irn=314318 Repository:National Museum of the American Indian View more collections from the Smithsonian Institution.
